issue.title: Windows compilation errors related to WideAngleCamera

content.html:
When compiling on windows this week i had some minor issues:

had to

#undef ERROR

in rest_response.pb.h

and in some of the Files that showed the above error C2027 i had to either add a default destructor like

/// \brief Private fields of camera lens
class CameraLensPrivate
{

  public: ~CameraLensPrivate() = default;

  /// \brief Linear scale factor

or remove it:

  //public: ~CameraLens() = default;

Currently having some issues with hg and no time to re-build from scratch, will try to commit a pull request in the new year. I felt those lines might help someone maybe and as I'll be in vacation for a few weeks didn't want to hold it back until I have a neat pull request and all.

Apart from those issues a number of paths were not set correctly when going through the tutorial, I added some to LIB and INCLUDE as needed. There might be some extra dependencies that are not included in the list the tutorials gives, I would have to check with a clean install.
